name: newsobserver.com - Various fixes
description: Various fixes to newsobserver.com for readability: font changes, hide elements, etc.
additional_info:
UPDATED 2014-09-09
* Fixed font size on homepage in headline rail.
* FF on Win32 fonts are HIDEOUS!!  Sigh.

UPDATED 2014-02-28
* Fixed font selector on blog pages.

UPDATED 2013-06-24
* Replaced the gradient in the masthead because the original is hideous.
UPDATED 2013-03-01
Tweaked the home page section blocks.

I don't know WHAT god awful font is being used on section fronts, but it's f-cking HIDEOUS!  Changed smaller fonts to Verdana (PUKE!) and larger fonts to Optima.  Not great but at least it isn't offensive to look at.

UPDATED 2013-02-14
* N&O now uses Aurora page styling so styles have been updated to remove ads, etc.
* NOTE: The page uses JavaScript AFTER the page loads in order to set the ginormous story header just above the story content.  The only ways to eliminate that are either: (a) greasemonkey script, (b) after the page has loaded, turn the N&O stylish style OFF and then turn it back on.
